entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:34 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
